name: Memories of Life
description:
STORY:
Imagine being caught in a terrible accident, but given the chance to relive pivotal moments from your life. Take care to observe each memory closely, for there is a key hidden within each one that can help you find your way to safety.

GAME INSTRUCTIONS:
Find the phone, grab it with "F". "Right Click" to use the camera.
Use the phone camera to find things around the house.
"Left click" to take a picture. Find the code for the keypad.

We did this game in one week for the "Indie Game Dev Beginners #002" jam.
This is the first game we (individually) published, we hope you enjoy it!
